abstract: United States Circuit Court of Appeals for Fifth Circuit rejects bid to release inmate Albert Woodfox, who was convicted twice in stabbing death of prison guard Brent Miller in 1972 and has served more than 40 years in solitary confinement.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court rejected a bid to release Mr. Woodfox, who was convicted in the 1972 killing of a prison guard but maintains he is innocent.

headline.main: Albert Woodfox, Angola Inmate, Can Be Tried 3rd Time, Court Rules
headline.print_headline: Louisiana Inmate Can Be Tried 3rd Time for Killing of Guard, Court Rules

snippet: A federal appeals court rejected a bid to release Mr. Woodfox, who was convicted in the 1972 killing of a prison guard but maintains he is innocent.
